title: Putting People In Their Place: Tuesday, October 4th, 2022
description:
1. Billy Eichner blames straight people for dismal opening of gay romcom 'Bros' (NY Post) (17:30)
  2. Lena Dunham slammed for saying she wants her casket driven in Pride parade (Page Six) (26:00)
  3. Germaphobe Howard Stern leaves 'bunker' to dine with pals for first time since 2020 (Page Six) (32:17)
  4. The Biggest Revelations for Constance Wu's Memoir 'Making a Scene' (PEOPLE) (40:00)
  5. The Try Guys Will Edit Ned Fulmer Out of Future Videos amid 'Shocking' Infidelity Scandal (PEOPLE) (45:30)

- Tell Me Lies Recap (50:00)

The Morning Toast with Jackie  (@JackieOshry) and Claudia Oshry  (@girlwithnojob) 
NLOG Tickets
Merch
The Toast Patreon
Girl With No Job by Claudia Oshry
